comment: Worst teacher ever! KSU should be reprimanded for allowing this thing in a classroom to front as a school master. She has NO grasp of physics and no teaching skills what so ever. I got an A but I want my money back.

Easily the worst professor I have had to take. After doing quite well in her class but I still recommend avoiding at all costs.  I wish I were joking but she knows next to nothing about physics and wont answer students simple questions.  Very rude. If I could give a 0/5 I would.

AVOID at all costs - this professor emotionally ABUSES students. Worst prof I ever had; she is defensive when asked simple questions about the material. Belittles students in front of class. Her sarcasm in not funny and unprovoked. Her temper is out of line; slams doors, yells at students. She does not grade according to the syllabus.

Literally treats her students like crap, has no knowledge whatsoever of the material she teaches, you could read the chapter in the book a few times and be more knowledgeable than her. She started to semester grading in one way, then with three weeks of class left, decides to change her syllabus and grading methods. Gets pissed if questioned. AVOID
Boring!!!! She gives you busy work to do in lab
